SEARCH
Package Login

Interface UserRegistry<T extends Users.Users>

Type Parameters:
T - The type of user that extends Users and is managed by this registry.
public interface UserRegistry<T extends Users.Users>
Interface for managing a registry of users. Provides methods to add users, retrieve all users, and find a user by their unique ID.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    addUser(T user)
    Adds a user to the registry.
    T
    findUserByID(String userID)
    Finds a user by their unique ID.
    List<T>
    getAllUsers()
    Retrieves a list of all users in the registry.

  • Method Details

    • addUser

      void addUser(T user)
      Adds a user to the registry.
      Parameters:
      user - The user to add.

    • getAllUsers

      List<T> getAllUsers()
      Retrieves a list of all users in the registry.
      Returns:
      A List of all users.

    • findUserByID

      T findUserByID(String userID)
      Finds a user by their unique ID.
      Parameters:
      userID - The ID of the user to find.
      Returns:
      The user with the specified ID, or null if no such user exists.
